God fucking damn it. Get that NTR tag in there.

Edit: after having read the other comments people seem to think that NTR specifically requires there to be a preexisting relationship. This is not the case. As we can see from the title itself which has NTR in the name, NTR is more about the notion of the character the audience is meant to be treating as the main character of the doujin (or other) having the object of their affection and desire being fucked in front of them with them being helpless to intervene. Needless to say NTR pisses me the fuck off and I had it god damn blacklisted for a reason.
